title: A random reward (popup)?
body: So, I'm a noob. There was a popup, with a treasure chest without a lid, that appeared in the middle of my screen when I finished my first game of URF.. So I clicked 'Awesome', and nothing happened. Is this an April Fools joke, or is it legit?

replies.body: how about you learn to read
Check your summoner icons and gifting history.
its a summoner icon for winning a game of URF im pretty sure
u got sitted down u little nub
